Articles.Content: Is it there a mod around to let me scale my parts in flight? If not is there a a tweak i can make to the cfg files to give me the desired effect?
Modding question moved to the modding subforums.
From the TweakScale side a definite no. I don't think touching the scale of parts mid-flight is safe to do at all, especially if they are part of a vessel.
Why would you want to rescale your textures in flight?! That would bring about a ton of issues...

What im wanting to do is have small wheels and such that i can enlarge and shrink as needed. Ialso have a dome part that slows me down in atmosphere really well, if i can put a small one one my ship then enlarge it before entering the atmosphere, i could use it like a chute you dont have to repack while still acting as a structural peice.
